title: Bookish: Adult Coloring Book
description: Amazon Best-Selling Author Martha Sweeney is pleased to present to you, the reader, your very own bookish themed adult coloring book. That's right. It's a coloring book dedicated to reading and books. With over 40 different designs and fun games, this coloring book is perfect for the book lover in you.Find some of your favorite book terms and phrases to color: book lover, so many books so little time, once upon a time, and much more.Each page is single-sided, allowing those who prefer markers to color also. (Note: A divider is recommended when using markers.)
author: Martha Sweeney
